title: Transcriptome-wide Mendelian randomization and single-cell analysis during CD4
abstract: Immunotherapy has become a promising treatment for various cancers, including colorectal cancer (CRC). Despite significant progress, identifying immune cell-specific therapeutic targets remains challenging, especially for CD4
